entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Finally I was able to create the IPA file with this command and upload the file with altool without any errors. #22694
  • Error building the tutorial app #22692
  • GetPlacemarksAsync always returns null when running on Windows #22690
  • Geolocation.StartListeningForegroundAsync stopps calling event after 2 positions on Android #22683
  • [iOS] Crash because of FontIconSource #22682
  • [iOS] CollectionView flickers when Label in DataTemplate has TextType="Html" #22681
  • Horizontal Scrollview and StackLayout not scrolling with mouse scroll wheel - Windows Platform #22680
  • Webview Navigating Cancel = true request is still send on WinUI #22678
  • [MAUI][VS Code]When you quickly scroll the Vertical CollectionView, the page will get stuck. #22677
  • GestureRecognizers overlaps in a control #22675
  • [Android][CollectionView]Crash when quickly clicking to delete item #22674

Closed

  • TitleView causes memory leaks #21968
    Backlog
  • Layout cycle crash on Windows with Button with image inside FlexLayout #21970
    .NET 8 SR6
  • [Testing] Move repetitive code that was created during Appium bump to extension methods #22063
    .NET 8 SR6
  • [META] Xcode 15.3 Support for .NET 8 and MAUI #21057
    Backlog
  • DatePicker and TimePicker use outdated controls on iOS #22669
  • Views don’t default to native attributes #22665
  • Unhandled Exception appearing randomly #22670
  • CanExecute can not change Button clickability #22652
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [ci] Update Maestro.targets #22689
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix BindingAdapterPosition Exception #22676
    community ✨

Merged

  • [Windows] Remove workaround for label text decorations #22650
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-label, t/perf
  • TitleView causes memory leaks - fix #22673
    community ✨, area-controls-titleview, t/perf
  • [Testing] Added attribute to mark (and ignore) flaky UI Tests #22684
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [net9.0] Update arcade to net9 #22688
    area-infrastructure
  • [ci] Update packages System.Drawing #22691
    area-infrastructure
  • [iOS] Bring iOS to preview5 #22686
  • Fix TemplateTests.PublishNativeAOTRootAllMauiAssemblies #22685
  • [Testing] Removed repetitive code from UITests #22679
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing

Updated

  • Cross TabBar navigation broken on iOS - Fix #22655
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • Support changing Window coordinates while changing those coordinates #22583
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window
  • Fix the FontImageSource for Windows Unpackaged #22646
    platform/windows 🪟, area-fonts
  • Migrate iOS from NavigationRenderer to NavigationViewHandler #20759
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • Add a bunch of button tests #22622
    area-testing, area-controls-button
  • Fix <ApplicationTitle> encoding in maui-mobile template #22084
    area-templates, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale
  • [resizetizer] don't generate files during design-time builds #22562
    area-single-project
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • Replace Deprecated BeginImageContextWithOptions with UIGraphicsImageRenderer #18631
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-essentials, legacy-area-controls, stale
  • [XC] Compile TemplateBindingExtension #22008
    area-xaml
  • Fixed line break mode for buttons #20133
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [XC] Fix loading non-compiled ResourceDictionary #22664
    area-xaml
  • [UI Testing] Add legacy tests (alternative) #22635
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Win] Double tap behavior #20870
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [Android] DatePicker Focus and Unfocus events #20547
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [android] fix one layer of "overdraw" by default #22126
    platform/android 🤖, legacy-area-perf, t/perf
  • IllegalArgumentException when changing number of tabbar pages - fix #22589
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Make sure to redraw the background drawable when the size is updated #22626
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing
  • [Testing] Remove IgnoreIfPlatforms usage on UITests #22526
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [iOS] Not display InputAccessoryView closing the Software keyboard #22394
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor
  • Fix BindingAdapterPosition Exception #22660
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22537
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
